name: Tech Startup
description: Modern, innovative tech company aesthetic. Bold gradients, dynamic animations, and contemporary design patterns for cutting-edge products.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Forward-thinking design that conveys innovation and trust. Use gradients and glass-morphism effects tastefully. Create visual interest through asymmetry and bold typography.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Vibrant purple-to-blue gradients for hero sections. Teal accent for CTAs and highlights. Dark backgrounds with light text for modern feel. Support both light and dark themes.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Embrace rounded corners and soft shadows. Use animated micro-interactions for engagement. Hero sections should be impactful with clear value propositions. Cards should feel elevated with subtle depth.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Ensure gradient text meets contrast requirements. Provide reduced motion alternatives for animations. Focus states must be clearly visible against gradient backgrounds.
